title: STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ Ultimate Sith Edition
STAR WARS™: The Force Unleashed™ Ultimate Sith Edition
notes: Might have something to do with .NET framework

Bypassed launcher by renaming "SWTFU.exe" to "SWTFU Launcher.exe" to get it started. Had to manually change resolution because of it (normally done in launcher) by changing config file located here: Local\ Settings/Application\ Data/Aspyr/Star\ Wars\ The\ Force\ Unleashed/Config.xml.
Works nicely in 4k, played through first 2 missions without any issues noticed.
title: STAR WARS™ - The Force Unleashed™ Ultimate Sith Edition

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.6-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 6.0.1)
notes: As another user already said had to bypass launcher by renaming "SWTFU.exe" to "SWTFU Launcher.exe" to get it started. Had to manually change resolution as well, after that it worked flawlessly with an ultrawide screen. Played it for like 1 hour without any issue
title: STAR WARS™ - The Force Unleashed™ Ultimate Sith Edition
